text: Jwalakwe ni Ajula jwaakunkombolasya wanganyammwe kwenda pankuli ni pambwani, kwikanila ndema jankuwaga mu yombo, nikwendaga nao (yomboyo) ni mbungo jambone, wanganyao nikusengwa nayo, (mwatwitu!) mbungo jachimbunga nikuiwichilila (yomboyo), nikwawichilila soni wanganyao matumbela kuumila mbali ni mbali, kaneka wanganyao nikulupilila yanti asyungulilidwe (ni chonasiko); akasam’bendaga Allah mwakunswejechesya dini Jakwe (pakum’benda Jwelepejo, achitiji): “Naga nkwika mwakutujokola mu yalakweyi chisimu chene chituwe mu wakutogolela.”
